history.proof: intros a b c H. rewrite Z.sub_nocarry_ldiff in H. symmetry. - shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : Z H : Z.ldiff a c = (b - c)%Z Unable to unify "Z.ldiff a c = (b - c)%Z" with "b = a".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall a b c : Z, Z.sub a c = Z.sub b c -> a = b

Premises:
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
Znumtheory.Zdivide_mod_minus : forall a b c : Z, (0 <= c < b)%Z -> (b | a - c)%Z -> (a mod b)%Z = c
ZMicromega.Zgcd_minus : forall a b c : Z, (a | c - b)%Z -> (Z.gcd a b | c)%Z
Z.sub_nocarry_ldiff : forall a b : Z, Z.ldiff b a = 0%Z -> (a - b)%Z = Z.ldiff a b
Z.add_nocarry_lxor : forall a b : Z, Z.land a b = 0%Z -> (a + b)%Z = Z.lxor a b
Z.bits_inj' : forall a b : Z, (forall n : Z, (0 <= n)%Z -> Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n) -> a = b
Z.rem_eq : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> Z.rem a b = (a - b * (a ÷ b))%Z
Zmod_eq_full : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (a mod b)%Z = (a - a / b * b)%Z
Z.land_ldiff : forall a b : Z, Z.land (Z.ldiff a b) b = 0%Z
Z.div_mod : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> a = (b * (a / b) + a mod b)%Z
Z.quot_rem : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> a = (b * (a ÷ b) + Z.rem a b)%Z
ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol_sub : forall (p : EnvRing.Pol Z) (a b : Z), (0 < Z.gcd a b)%Z -> ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol a (EnvRing.PsubC Z.sub p b) -> ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol (Z.gcd a b) p
Z.bits_inj_iff : forall a b : Z, Z.eqf (Z.testbit a) (Z.testbit b) < -> a = b
Z.mod_opp_opp : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (- a mod - b)%Z = (- (a mod b))%Z
Z.mod_opp_l_nz : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (a mod b)%Z <> 0%Z -> (- a mod b)%Z = (b - a mod b)%Z
Zmod_eq : forall a b : Z, (b > 0)%Z -> (a mod b)%Z = (a - a / b * b)%Z
Z.lxor_spec : forall a b n : Z, Z.testbit (Z.lxor a b) n = xorb (Z.testbit a n) (Z.testbit b n)
Z.ldiff_spec : forall a b n : Z, Z.testbit (Z.ldiff a b) n = (Z.testbit a n && negb (Z.testbit b n))%bool
Z.mod_eq : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (a mod b)%Z = (a - b * (a / b))%Z
Znumtheory.Zgcd_is_gcd : forall a b : Z, Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b (Z.gcd a b)
Z_mod_nz_opp_full : forall a b : Z, (a mod b)%Z <> 0%Z -> (- a mod b)%Z = (b - a mod b)%Z
Znumtheory.Zis_gcd_for_euclid : forall a b d q : Z, Znumtheory.Zis_gcd b (a - q * b) d -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b d
Z.mod_neg_bound : forall a b : Z, (b < 0)%Z -> (b < a mod b <= 0)%Z
Z.mod_pos_bound : forall a b : Z, (0 < b)%Z -> (0 <= a mod b < b)%Z
Z.mod_opp_r_nz : forall a b : Z, b <> 0%Z -> (a mod b)%Z <> 0%Z -> (a mod - b)%Z = (a mod b - b)%Z
Znumtheory.Zdivide_mod : forall a b : Z, (b | a)%Z -> (a mod b)%Z = 0%Z
Z_mod_nz_opp_r : forall a b : Z, (a mod b)%Z <> 0%Z -> (a mod - b)%Z = (a mod b - b)%Z
Znumtheory.Zdivide_opp_l_rev : forall a b : Z, (- a | b)%Z -> (a | b)%Z
Znumtheory.Zdivide_opp_l : forall a b : Z, (a | b)%Z -> (- a | b)%Z
ZMicromega.Zdiv_Pc : forall x c : Z, (x | c)%Z -> ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol x (EnvRing.Pc c)
Z.add_mod : forall a b n : Z, n <> 0%Z -> ((a + b) mod n)%Z = ((a mod n + b mod n) mod n)%Z
BinIntDef.Z.div = fun a b : Z => let (q, _) := BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl a b in q : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.div (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.modulo = fun a b : Z => let (_, r) := BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl a b in r : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.modulo (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.mod_unique : forall a b q r : Z, (0 <= r < b)%Z \/ (b < r <= 0)%Z -> a = (b * q + r)%Z -> r = (a mod b)%Z
Znumtheory.Zis_gcd_intro : forall a b g : Z, (g | a)%Z -> (g | b)%Z -> (forall x : Z, (x | a)%Z -> (x | b)%Z -> (x | g)%Z) -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b g
ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol_sub_0 : forall (p : EnvRing.Pol Z) (a : Z), ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol a (EnvRing.PsubC Z.sub p 0%Z) -> ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol a p
BinIntDef.Z.rem = fun a b : Z => snd (BinIntDef.Z.quotrem a b) : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.rem (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.quot = fun a b : Z => fst (BinIntDef.Z.quotrem a b) : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.quot (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.gcd = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => BinIntDef.Z.abs b | Z.pos a0 | Z.neg a0 => match b with | 0%Z => BinIntDef.Z.abs a | Z.pos b0 | Z.neg b0 => Z.pos (Pos.gcd a0 b0) end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.gcd (_ _)%Z_scope
Zmod_small : forall a n : Z, (0 <= a < n)%Z -> (a mod n)%Z = a
Znumtheory.Zis_gcd_ind : forall (a b g : Z) (P : Prop), ((g | a)%Z -> (g | b)%Z -> (forall x : Z, (x | a)%Z -> (x | b)%Z -> (x | g)%Z) -> P) -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b g -> P

``` 
intros a b c H.
rewrite Z.sub_nocarry_ldiff in H.
symmetry.
apply H.
```

original: intros a b c H. rewrite Z.sub_nocarry_ldiff in H. symmetry. apply H.
